videos.headline: Purdue uses trickeration for go-ahead TD
videos.description: Purdue RB Jared Sparks takes it on a reverse before hitting QB David Blough for a 7-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: Purdue RB pounds it in for TD
videos.description: Purdue RB Alexander Horvath drives it in to increase the Boilermakers lead to 46-7.
